ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_0nn0 | |- 0 e. NN0 |
| 2 |  | #P_risefacval | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ 0 e. NN0 ) -> ( A RiseFac 0 ) = prod_ k e. ( 0 ... ( 0 - 1 ) ) ( A + k ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A RiseFac 0 ) = prod_ k e. ( 0 ... ( 0 - 1 ) ) ( A + k ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_risefall0lem | |- ( 0 ... ( 0 - 1 ) ) = (/) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_prodeq1i | |- prod_ k e. ( 0 ... ( 0 - 1 ) ) ( A + k ) = prod_ k e. (/) ( A + k ) |
| 6 |  | #P_prod0 | |- prod_ k e. (/) ( A + k ) = 1 |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_eqtri | |- prod_ k e. ( 0 ... ( 0 - 1 ) ) ( A + k ) = 1 |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A RiseFac 0 ) = 1 ) |
